meanings.definition: More golden in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sunset was even goldener than yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked goldener in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The goldener banana was the star of the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The goldener glow of the fire lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The goldener hue of the painting mesmerized the viewers.

meanings.sent1: This coin is goldener than the others in the collection.
meanings.sent2: The goldener ring sparkled on her finger.
meanings.sent3: The goldener trophy was awarded to the winner of the race.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as goldener as the sun itself.
meanings.sent5: The goldener leaves of autumn painted a beautiful scene in the park.
